document_data.name: Vargor
document_data.mainbody: '''Vargor''' was an [[ogre]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] who was one of the [[Burntbone Horde]]'s many leaders. He helped lead its forces in occupying [[Sharpstone Keep]], from where he oversaw banditry operations on the road to [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.History: He was slain by [[adventurers]] on the orders of [[Open Lord]] [[Laeral Silverhand]] of Waterdeep after they drove his [[goblin]] and [[kobold]] bandit underlings back to the Keep.
